name: Witch's Rhythm Puzzle
description:
Overview

It's a puzzle game meets rhythm game combined into a lighthearted ecchi romp!
Battle as cute sexy witches as you drop blocks to the beat to clear rows your side of the puzzle stage.

Send blocks to your opponent's side to throw them off rhythm and tear their clothes asunder!
Each stage contains a new kind of catchy rhythm and a new puzzle element for ever increasing challenge!

Story

In a world where magic developed in place of technology, ten lovely witches live together in a grand tower to study and grow their mystical knowledge.
However, trouble emerges when a mysterious force takes control of their bodies and makes them try to strip one another!
Thought at first to be some kind of prank, these antics arouse the attention of an unexpected guest,
and it soon becomes clear there are far more powerful forces at work.

Can these witches learn to cooperate in order to save their tower, and their wardrobes from complete destruction?

Characters

Ibis, the Self Proclaimed Natural Born Witch.

Entail, the Gruff Magical Warrior

Tariff, Resident of Fairy Tail Land

Droff, the Witch Doctor from Another Land

Forge, the Impish Temptress

Virgule, Keeper of the Tower

Yew, the Suave Cross Dressing Ladies Woman

Sleek, The Astrologer From Another Land

Minnow, the One and Only Glasses Wearer

Boggart, The Great and Powerful

Features

  • 15 different stages of variable difficulty + hidden bonus stages.
  • An Unlock all stages option for a more arcade style game experience.
  • Click the timing calibration tool in the settings menu to ensure comfortable input on any setup.
  • Non-stop survival mode to test your skills and endurance from one stage after another.
  • Dressing Room mode to view colorful detailed character artwork, read bios, and even toggle clothing layers for ecchi fun!
